column4: noob question, Ethernet controller: Intel Corporation 82562ET/EZ/GT/GZ - PRO/100 VE (LOM) Ethernet Controller (rev 03)
-- what kind of network card this mean I have?
i cant see drivers for an intel ethernet controller not included in ubuntu
so 'ifconfig -a' doesnt show a eth0? how about 'cat /etc/iftab' ?
